moreBlocks.articles:
• Motor Vehicle Accidents
    Our experienced attorneys routinely handle personal injury and wrongful death cases stemming from motor vehicle accidents.
  • Products Liability
    If you have been injured by a faulty product, or a family member has died because of a product, you need legal representation to find accountability and to protect others from the same fate.
  • Birth Injuries
    Our law firm handles the full range of medical malpractice cases. We have represented individuals in cases where doctors did not use the expected standard of care. Let our lawyers help you through your medical malpractice case.
  • Nursing Home Neglect
    It is difficult to entrust your loved one to a nursing home, but at times it is necessary. Our lawyers handle numerous egregious cases where the standard of care used in nursing homes is lacking.
  • Brain Injuries
    If you have been a victim of an accident and have a serious brain injury, you need the help of an attorney. Our lawyers can help you fight for the compensation you need to move on with life.

description:
After an unexpected injury or loss, you need to turn to an experienced law firm that you trust. Founded in 1979, Jeffries, Kube, Forrest & Monteleone Co. L.P.A., is a law firm focused on personal injury matters. Our lawyers provide exceptional legal representation, a commitment to personal service and decades of experience. Located in Cleveland, Ohio, our law firm serves clients in Northern Ohio and across the state with professionalism and care. We truly care for our clients and will do everything within the confines of the law to assist them.

We handle personal injury, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse and neglect, product liability, wrongful death and employment law disputes. In each of these cases, we work relentlessly to address our clients' physical and economic recovery, and fight for the just compensation that our clients need and deserve.

Dedicated to our clients, we have earned a reputation for excellent client service and attention to detail in our work. We are known for ensuring that our clients are kept current on developments in their cases. Additionally, our legal professionals return e-mails and phone calls promptly and efficiently.

As a small firm, we are able to listen to each of our clients and fully understand their situations. Then we take the time to analyze each situation in light of the laws that apply. Our four experienced trial attorneys have the type of experience you need in and out of the courtroom. If you are interested in a personalized approach and want experienced, committed, attorneys on your side, contact Jeffries, Kube, Forrest & Monteleone Co. L.P.A. to schedule an appointment.
